data.title: Disco Boy – Cinema Public
data.meta_description: Aleksei flees his country and joins the Foreign Legion. He is sent to Niger where Jomo fights for his village. Their destinies will meet.
data.text:
Ready to do anything to escape Belarus, Aleksei heads for Paris and joins the Foreign Legion. He is sent to fight in the Niger Delta, where Jomo, a young revolutionary, is fighting against the oil companies that have devastated his village. While Aleksei looks for a new family in the Legion, Jomo imagines himself as a dancer, a disco boy. In the jungle, their dreams and destinies cross paths.

Berlin International Film Festival 2023 – Silver Bear
